comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool/Hydrographic survey of the Stokes Bay Front Range area and complete additional delineation of a dumpsite area. Consultant will provide tender support and supervise the lead paint abatement and subsequent soil remediation, and complete a final report documenting project activities at the Stokes Bay Gront Range Lightstation, Knife Island, Lake Huron, ON
